metadata.synopsis: A goblin comes up to you after you've poisoned the beer and gives you a glass of newly poisoned alcohol, proposing a toast. She's standing on a cage (about 2m high) together with the player.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - In DebugBook: GoToRegion -> Act1 -> GOB - GoblinCamp -> Teleport to Festivities Area (anything)- In DebugBook: Set quest flags & option -> Act1 -> GOB - Goblin Camp -> Goblin Toast -> Poison the beer tub- Get near the goblin stage

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Oh, go away! You elves think you're all special.

40.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
40.context: NodeContext: You just made a really stupid toast, so the goblin is booing you.

92.text: Watcha standing 'ere all dry fer? C'mere, have a drink!
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin waves the player over and holds out a drink. (she should be holding two cups, one in each hand). The player isn't on the cage yet.

95.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
95.text: Watcha standing 'ere all dry fer? C'mere, have a drink!
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin waves the player over and holds out a drink. (she should be holding two cups, one in each hand). The player isn't on the cage yet.

98.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
98.text: What should we toast to, eh?
98.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player isn't on the cage yet,

49.speaker: Player
49.text: It's your party - celebrate it however you like.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player teleported next to the goblin.NodeContext: Good-natured joke.

107.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
107.text: Ha! I'll show ya how it's done.
107.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player teleported next to the goblin.NodeContext: Good-natured joke.

43.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: She should turn to the left to address the other goblins.  If possible, he should raise his glass at the end. NodeContext: He's calling to the other goblins standing around, then shouting a toast.

7.speaker: Warlock Gurk
7.text: To tha' duke's face when we gave 'im to the drow!
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: All the goblins should raise their cups.InternalNodeContext: There should be a cheer of multiple (3) goblins at the end of this node.NodeContext: The goblin is making a toast.

24.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
24.text: To findin' those looters and crushin' 'em!
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: All the goblins should raise their cups.InternalNodeContext: There should be a cheer of multiple (3) goblins at the end of this node.NodeContext: The goblin is making a toast.

22.speaker: Narrator
22.text: *The goblins blink at you in confusion.*

76.speaker: Player
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblins gawk at you while the silence stretches on.NodeContext: The goblin doesn't know how to react. There is a long pause, and then he clears his throat.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: May I bed each and every one of you before the sun sets!
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblins gawk at you while the silence stretches on.NodeContext: The goblin doesn't know how to react. There is a long pause, and then he clears his throat.

54.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblins gawk at you while the silence stretches on.NodeContext: The goblin doesn't know how to react. There is a long pause, and then he clears his throat.

81.speaker: Tracker Klagga
81.text: Ya can always take a bite out of me!
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: If there are other goblins in the vicinity, they could look at him as though he's a bit crazy.NodeContext: Very excited. He's totally down for this.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: Spill the beer, then pretend to drink from the empty cup.
82.context: NodeContext: The player finally drank, she's happy and encouragin them to drink more.

25.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
25.context: NodeContext: The player finally drank, she's happy and encouragin them to drink more.

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
1.context: NodeContext: The player finally drank, she's happy and encouragin them to drink more.

61.text: Hey! That's our beer you're wastin'! Ain't good enough for ya?
61.context: NodeContext: a little surprised and a little angry.

29.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
29.text: Hey! That's our beer you're wastin'! Ain't good enough for ya?
29.context: NodeContext: a little surprised and a little angry.

44.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
44.text: You think there's somethin' wrong with it?
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin is looking into their cup.NodeContext: aside to another goblin. a little distrustful

38.speaker: Warlock Gurk
38.text: I told ya we shouldn't be drinkin' the foam. It ain't right.

26.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
26.text: Wait, 'ave ya been tamperin' with our beer? That what ye've been standin' 'round 'ere for?

79.speaker: Player
79.text: Don't be stupid. You might be able to drink all day - the Absolute needs me sober.

32.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
32.text: Hah! You drew the short end of the stick, didn't ya? I'd say it's clear who the Absolute favours.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Drink quickly to squash their suspicions.
47.context: NodeContext: Hah is an actual laugh.

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *The poison burns your throat, but the goblin relaxes.*
36.context: NodeContext: Hah is an actual laugh.

80.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
80.text: You looked real suspicious for a bit. Now get outta my way - I need another drink!
80.context: NodeContext: Hah is an actual laugh.

34.speaker: Player
34.context: NodeContext: a little bit displeased, but not actually angry, The player spilled some beer, but she's letting him off.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: Aw, c'mon. I've already had a few cups... can barely see straight.
74.context: NodeContext: a little bit displeased, but not actually angry, The player spilled some beer, but she's letting him off.

75.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
75.text: Well, watch it - we worked hard for that beer!
75.context: NodeContext: a little bit displeased, but not actually angry, The player spilled some beer, but she's letting him off.

70.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
70.text: Well, watch it - we worked hard for that beer!
70.context: NodeContext: a little bit displeased, but not actually angry, The player spilled some beer, but she's letting him off.

83.text: Right, you think I believe that? Lemme show ya how we handle liars 'round here.

39.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
39.text: Right, you think I believe that? Lemme show ya how we handle liars 'round here.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: I was checking none of you idiots had spilled anything foul in there.

85.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
85.text: Anyway. 'S good beer, so don't waste it. Now get outta my way - I need another drink!

8.text: Yer... what... yer lyin', ain'tcha? Lemme show ya how we handle liars 'round here.
8.context: NodeContext: confused at first, then getting angry

17.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
17.text: Yer... what... yer lyin', ain'tcha? Lemme show ya how we handle liars 'round here.
17.context: NodeContext: confused at first, then getting angry

41.speaker: Player
41.context: NodeContext: we are reading her mind. She's a bit confused by what the player just did and doesn't entirely believe someone could've snuck in their camp to poison their beer, because the Absolute would protect them.

90.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
90.text: Wastin' beer just like that drow True Soul. Said she needed a clear head for Absolute business. Bah!
90.context: NodeContext: we are reading her mind. She's a bit confused by what the player just did and doesn't entirely believe someone could've snuck in their camp to poison their beer, because the Absolute would protect them.

18.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
18.text: Wastin' beer just like that drow True Soul. Said she needed a clear head for Absolute business. Bah!
18.context: NodeContext: we are reading her mind. She's a bit confused by what the player just did and doesn't entirely believe someone could've snuck in their camp to poison their beer, because the Absolute would protect them.

65.text: Hey! Whatcha doin'? I knew there was something off 'bout you! Get 'er!
65.context: NodeContext: Mad and a bit confused. We tried to read her mind, but she realised and is now angry

28.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
28.text: Hey! Whatcha doin'? I knew there was something off 'bout you! Get 'em!
28.context: NodeContext: Mad and a bit confused. We tried to read her mind, but she realised and is now angry

55.speaker: Player
55.text: After you! I shouldn't drink before the host.

60.text: Why not? Wait, 'ave ya been tamperin' wif our beer? That what ye've been standin' 'round 'ere for?

94.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
94.text: Why not? Wait, 'ave ya been tamperin' wif our beer? That what ye've been standin' 'round 'ere for?

14.speaker: Narrator
14.text: *Besides a slight tingle, your stomach doesn't react to the poison.*

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *The poison burns your throat, but the goblins follow your lead.*

108.speaker: Player
108.text: I'm simply being a good guest, that's all.

89.text: That's how you end up dry, mate - not that I'm complainin'!

23.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
23.text: That's how you end up dry, mate - not that I'm complainin'!

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Now get outta my way - I need another drink!

100.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
100.text: Now get outta my way - I need another drink!

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Show off an elaborate bartending trick.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player balances the cup on their head, dances around for a second with it, then bounces it from their head, catching it in their hand. NodeContext: Do not record.

9.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player balances the cup on their head, dances around for a second with it, then bounces it from their head, catching it in their hand. NodeContext: Do not record.

69.speaker: Player
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player balances the cup on their head, dances around for a second with it, then bounces it from their head, catching it in their hand. NodeContext: Do not record.

2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
2.context: NodeContext: Applauding - the player just did a cool trick.

99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player fails at its trick of flipping his drink into the air and spilling the drink everywhere (over the player if allowed/able)NodeContext: Do not record.

57.speaker: Player
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player fails at its trick of flipping his drink into the air and spilling the drink everywhere (over the player if allowed/able)NodeContext: Do not record.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: Hey! That's our beer you're wastin'! Shove off!

58.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
58.text: Hey! That's our beer you're wastin'! Shove off!
58.context: NodeContext: Displeased - the player tried to do a trick, but spilled all the beer in his cup.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: I'm glad you asked. Tell everyone to gather round...
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player teleported next to the goblin. She should turn to the left to address the other goblins. The other goblins go and refill their beer.NodeContext: The goblin is calling over the other goblins standing around.

68.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
68.text: Guys! This 'un's givin' us a toast!
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player teleported next to the goblin. She should turn to the left to address the other goblins. The other goblins go and refill their beer.NodeContext: The goblin is calling over the other goblins standing around.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: I'll pass. Need a clear head for now.
